error TS5107: Option 'target=ES5' is deprecated and will stop functioning in TypeScript 7.0. Specify compilerOption '"ignoreDeprecations": "6.0"' to silence this error.
es5-commonjs3.ts(2,12): error TS1216: Identifier expected. '__esModule' is reserved as an exported marker when transforming ECMAScript modules.


!!! error TS5107: Option 'target=ES5' is deprecated and will stop functioning in TypeScript 7.0. Specify compilerOption '"ignoreDeprecations": "6.0"' to silence this error.
==== es5-commonjs3.ts (1 errors) ====
    export default "test";
    export var __esModule = 1;
               ~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1216: Identifier expected. '__esModule' is reserved as an exported marker when transforming ECMAScript modules.
